docs.lead_paragraph: IT isn't really as bewildering as it seems. The simple fact is that Billy Martin is habit-forming, like cocaine or alcohol or Charlie Grimm or Bobo Newsom. docs.lead_paragraph: In the latest seismic shake-up for the franchise, Boston hired Dombrowski as president of baseball operations, and Ben Cherington declined to stay on as general manager.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column observes that Boston Red Sox have hired Dave Dombrowski as president of baseball operations, replacing Ben Cherington, who declined chance to stay on as general manager; holds that reviving team may be Dombrowski's biggest professional challenge yet.
